game.name: 松峰镇:诅咒
game.categories: Single-player, Adjustable Text Size, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: This is a suspenseful puzzle visual novel game. You play as a character who was born in Pine Peak as a child and returns to this long-lost town after many years. You get involved in a series of mysterious disappearances happening in the town and try to explore and solve the mystery.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This is a suspenseful puzzle visual novel game. You play as a character who was born in Pine Peak as a child and returns to this long-lost town after many years. You get involved in a series of mysterious disappearances happening in the town and try to explore and solve the mystery.
